description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Stuttgart vs Augsburg in the DFB Pokal
title: Stuttgart vs Augsburg: DFB Pokal stats & head-to-head
title_page: Stuttgart vs Augsburg: DFB Pokal stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Booking
Dimitris Giannoulis (FC Augsburg) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Post
Enzo Millot (VfB Stuttgart) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Marius Wolf (FC Augsburg).
